ffmpeg_next/format/format/
flag.rs

1use ffi::*;
2use libc::c_int;
3
4bitflags! {
5    #[derive(Copy, Clone, Debug, PartialEq, Eq)]
6    pub struct Flags: c_int {
7        const NO_FILE       = AVFMT_NOFILE;
8        const NEED_NUMBER   = AVFMT_NEEDNUMBER;
9        const SHOW_IDS      = AVFMT_SHOW_IDS;
10        #[cfg(not(feature = "ffmpeg_4_0"))]
11        const RAW_PICTURE   = AVFMT_RAWPICTURE;
12        const GLOBAL_HEADER = AVFMT_GLOBALHEADER;
13        const NO_TIMESTAMPS = AVFMT_NOTIMESTAMPS;
14        const GENERIC_INDEX = AVFMT_GENERIC_INDEX;
15        const TS_DISCONT    = AVFMT_TS_DISCONT;
16        const VARIABLE_FPS  = AVFMT_VARIABLE_FPS;
17        const NO_DIMENSIONS = AVFMT_NODIMENSIONS;
18        const NO_STREAMS    = AVFMT_NOSTREAMS;
19        const NO_BINSEARCH  = AVFMT_NOBINSEARCH;
20        const NO_GENSEARCH  = AVFMT_NOGENSEARCH;
21        const NO_BYTE_SEEK  = AVFMT_NO_BYTE_SEEK;
22        const ALLOW_FLUSH   = AVFMT_ALLOW_FLUSH;
23        const TS_NONSTRICT  = AVFMT_TS_NONSTRICT;
24        const TS_NEGATIVE   = AVFMT_TS_NEGATIVE;
25        const SEEK_TO_PTS   = AVFMT_SEEK_TO_PTS;
26    }
27}
